ygData.subject: Re: ACDC
ygData.msgSnippet: Its because its near cliff.No enemies go up cliff one...so VERY good for resting and dont have to worry about Griffins while resting. Inn3 is good in the sense
ygData.messageBody:
Its because its near cliff.No enemies go up cliff one...so VERY good for
resting and dont have to worry about Griffins while resting.

Inn3 is good in the sense thats its near WC zone so can zone out easily,but
that place is Griffin prone area and so near the Orc Camp and someore not
near cliff..if after a hard battle,ya life like 1 drop then while walking to
cliff might get mauled by some creature..

Anyway dont know many of u guys know anot.JUMP helps alot in escaping from
enemies,it lets u gain a distance so when u run out to zone or guards,the
enemy cannot hit u but it only works when u have at least 2 bubbles of
health remaining so u could still run...
